caption.p: Dust event frequency and precipitation anomaly. Time series of the dust event frequency (%; lines) and precipitation anomaly (in percentage with reference to the 2003–2015 climatology; bars) in the southern Great Plains (SGP; Box 3 in Fig. 1), northern Great Plains (NGP; Box 4), and the southwestern U.S. (Box 1) for each season (light green for winter, orange for spring, magenta for summer, and navy blue for fall). Recent drought years are shaded in grey. Correlation coefficients between the precipitation and dust event frequency above the 95% confidence level (t-test) are listed (color denoting seasons).
